verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Wednesday evening] , [ARG0: Tucker Carlson] [V: grilled] [ARG1: former Assistant U.S. Attorney Daniel Goldman] [ARG2: about the FBI ’s use of a paid informant to spy on the Trump campaign] . Goldman rebuffed the Fox News host ’s inquiries into why the FBI had employed such a tactic , at one point scolding him , “ You do n’t have a right to know . ”
